text: Unke baad humne pai dar pai (succession) apne Rasool bheje, aur in sabke baad Isa ibn-e-Maryam ko maboos kiya aur usko Injil ata ki, aur jin logon ne uski pairvi ikhtiyar ki unke dilon mein humne taras (tenderness ) aur reham daal diya. Aur rahbaniyat (monasticism) unhon ne khud ijaad karli, humne usey unpar farz nahin kiya tha. Magar Allah ki khushnudi ki talab mein unhon ne aap hi yeh bidaat nikali aur phir iski pabandi karne ka jo haqq tha usey ada na kiya. Unmein se jo log iman laye huye thay unka ajr humne unko ata kiya, magar unmein se aksar log faasiq hain
